alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dyer, northwestern Gibson and southeastern Obion Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 127 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newbern, or 12 miles east of Dyersburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Newbern, Dyer, Kenton, Rutherford, Trimble, Yorkville, Edgewood, Laneview, Grizzard, Churchton, Good Luck, Lapata, Tatumville, Central, Templeton, Currie, Tilghman, Barrons Corner and Tyson Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
